item.description:
http://boston.mrmovie...

We will be seeing the 8:00 pm showing, so let's meet at 7:30 so that we call all sit together.

I hope you can all make it.

Ivone

PS - I will NOT be buying tickets. Please go on-line and purchase your own or you may wait to purchase them when you get there, although I'm not sure how popular the movie will be or if there is a change of it selling out.
item.how_to_find_us: we will meet in the lobby
item.name: Let's go to the movies - X-Men Origins: Wolverine
